Do you feel unsure of yourself when speaking a foreign language?Now with DioVoice Online, you can communicate with people who use foreign language at anytime, anywhere.DioVoice Online is a translation App specialized for travelers and features voice recognition and TTS services in Korean, English and Japanese.[Special features of DioVoice Online]â¶ Translator with Voice Recognition Features-	English<->Korean-	Korean<->Japaneseâ¶ Text to Speech service in each language-	English & Korean, Japaneseâ¶ PlusPack support-	PlusPacks for the travel and tourism sector provide an advanced interpreting service that can be used in a range of places and situations when you travel abroad.â¶ Intuitive User Interface-	The intuitive interface service allows easy access and use of the service.-	A preferred UI language (English & Korean, Japanese) is available in the userâs desired language.â¶ Available online-	For best use of service, please be sure to connect to a 3G, LTE, or a Wi-Fi network.[Basic Information]â¶ Android 2.2 ~ 4.2, 800*480(WVGA)â¶ DIOTEK Facebook: www.facebook.com/DIOTEK
